timeline.bodyText:
Is this enforced anywhere in the config parsing?
And do the randomTransformConfig methods in the tests enforce this?  I guess if they choose completely random field names for each section of the config then it's highly unlikely the time field in the sync config would randomly be the same as the time field for the date histogram.  So maybe this problem can be ignored.
timeline.author: droberts195

replies.author: hendrikmuhs
